summary: An ordinance providing for the changing and establishing of the curb grades on Sand Point Way as established by Ordinance No. 52478 from Station 38 + 45 on the center line of Sand Point Way the same being approximately 520 feet more or less, west of the west margin of 50th Avenue Northeast, as established by Ordinance No. 50415 to Station 61 + 00 on said center line, the same being approximately 35 feet southwesterly from the intersection of said center line with the east line of the southeast quarter of the northeast quarter of Section 10, Township 25 North, Range 4 East W.M.
